Date: Thursday, 2/2/1991
Subject: Fan Reaction
Hello Boss,
Our fans aren't really happy about the loss of Ivan Calderon.
The overall fan interest decreases slightly.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director

Date: Monday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Status of Dave Eiland
Dear Sir,

I believe he isn't ready yet for that level!

Regards,
Scouting Director
